cause.description:
Israel faces constant criticism from the world, be it protecting its citizens or fighting terrorism the world still shows little support for Israel. It's soldiers and civilians are targeted daily by terrorists. Israel will always have to fight for its independence and its freedom, by joining this cause you are showing your support for the state of Israel and its existence.
Keren Kayemet Le'Yisrael (Jewish National Fund)
Founded in 1901, Jewish National Fund is a non-profit organization. JNF is the caretaker of the land of Israel, on behalf of its owners - Jewish people everywhere.
1. Israel has a right to exist.
2. Israel has the right to protect itself and its citizens.
cause.name: Support Israel
